name: Space Traffic
description:
Rotate your asteroid space station to avoid collisions with spaceships. They can pass through the cords that connect the station sections.

This game was made for 2-Buttons Jam 2019. The themes were: "Arm, Comet, Rope".

Music: http://www.twinmusicom.org

Font: Heartbit by Void - https://arcade.itch.io/heartbit
